name: SSF2
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: Depth of Renal Parenchymal Invasion
notes: **Note**:  Record the depth of invasion into the renal parenchyma as documented in the pathology report. Assign code 000 if surgical resection of the primary site (renal pelvis or ureter) is performed, the pathology report is available for review, and renal parenchymal invasion is not mentioned.
rows: Renal parenchymal invasion not present/not identified

1 - 979 millimeters (mm) 
(Exact depth of renal parenchymal invasion to nearest mm)

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)
Renal parenchymal invasion present, depth unknown
No surgical resection of primary site

Unknown or no information 
Not documented in patient record
